page.title: 01The Area In General.
page.content: Four main built up areas house most of the population in our area, they are: {Duckmanton Netherthorpe Woodthorpe}and {Shuttlewood.} None of these settlements is very large, Netherthorpe and Woodthorpe are villages whilst Duckmanton is a village with a housing estate and Shuttlewood is the largest. The area is a mixture of industry and agriculture, the main industry being{mining}whilst the agriculture is mainly{arable.} {Railway}lines interlace the area though many of these are no longer in service. The{M1 Motorway}also cuts through the middle of the area. It is an area with a long and interesting history stretching back to Stone Age times.
